metadata.dc:author: Corominas, S
Mallafré, J M
Carretero, P
Romero, J A
Bielsa, O
Piulachs, J
metadata.dc:description: We report on a 52-year-old patient with spontaneous intraperitoneal rupture of pyonephrosis. The diagnostic features, preoperative findings and treatment are discussed and the literature reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Pionefrosis como causa de peritonitis aguda. Revisión de la literatura y aportación de un caso.
[Pyonephrosis as a cause of acute peritonitis. Review of the literature and report of a case].
